articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: U.S. defence secretary urges North Korea to negotiate on denuclearization
articles.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Mark Esper on Thursday said the United States still sees a political agreement on denuclearization as the best path forward on North Korea, but that American forces remained prepared to fight if necessary.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Defense Secretary Mark Esper on Thursday said the United States still sees a political agreement on denuclearization as the best path forward on North Korea, but that American forces remained prepared to fight if necessary.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Egypt condemns Turkey decision to allow troop deployment to Libya
articles.description: Egypt strongly condemned on Thursday a vote by Turkey's parliament vote to allow a troop deployment to Libya, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement.
articles.content:
CAIRO (Reuters) - Egypt strongly condemned on Thursday a vote by Turkey’s parliament vote to allow a troop deployment to Libya, the Foreign Ministry said in a statement. 
Egypt said any such deployment could “negatively affect the stability of the Mediterran… [+161 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Canadian factory activity expands at slowest pace in four months
articles.description: Canadian manufacturing activity expanded in December at its slowest pace in four months as new orders declined and business optimism weakened, data showed on Thursday.
articles.content:
TORONTO (Reuters) - Canadian manufacturing activity expanded in December at its slowest pace in four months as new orders declined and business optimism weakened, data showed on Thursday.
